yandir.name: Yandir the Butcher
yandir.description: First boss of KA. Damaged alongside with Asprid. Can summon different totems which should be focused. Can jump - this should be blocked. Has cleave attack. On HM fire shamans are summoned. They also should burn in AoE. The more mages summoned - more meteors will fall on group. Meteors should be unstacked and blocked

vrol.name: Captain Vrol
vrol.description: Second boss of KA. Has simple portal mechanic. Summons adds, copies and conduit. Conduit is a high priority target. On execute summons meteors which should be unstacked and blocked. HM adds HP and damage.

falgravn.name: Lord Falgravn
falgravn.description: Last boss of KA. Has 3 stages. On 1st stage summons Lieutenant Njordal. Add is killed first, then the boss. Starts lightning mechanic of 90 and 80%. On 70% comes to stage 2, where group needs to unstack, kill prisons, block fountains and not to move on bloody phase. On 30% moves to last stage where he summons torturers. They can't be ignored on HM
